item.title: Deploying Anchor CMS on OpenShift
item.description: Some of you may already know that installing ghost on OpenShift is extremely easy (and free). You can check this post if you don’t believe me. I was wandering how is it with other small and less known CMS. Given that I was already making some local tests with [Anchor CMS](https://anchorcms.com" _target=“blank) for a friend, and given that there is almost nothing around about its deployment on Open Shift I decided to give it a try and write about it.
